sentences.en: Analogical reasoning ability is a central component of children cognition.

sentences.en: Double rhythms, resounding through the lyric depiction and connecting with each other , indicate the thespian place of mankind and the cognition of the writer to this thespian place.

sentences.en: Such attitudes are valueless unless they reflect inner cognition and certainty.

sentences.en: The personality system includes three parts: cognition, emotion and will.
